tasks.task: Training and consulting services for sustainable agricultural practices
subtasks: Organising training sessions on sustainable farm practices
Choosing topics relevant to increasing agricultural productivity and reducing costs
Scheduling training during low workload periods in agricultural sector
Organising informal spaces for farmer-to-farmer exchanges
Hosting the Agriculture and Environment Seminar annually
Inviting speakers to share personal life experiences, successes, failures, and lessons learned
Organising technical workshops covering topics like natural pest control and soil fertility
Providing detailed guidance on implementing practices on farms
Offering post-workshop farm consultations for farmers adopting new practices

tasks.task: Conducting farm visits and providing practical support
subtasks: Accompanying farmers in implementing new practices
Resolving questions and addressing issues during practice implementation

tasks.task: Training and consulting services for sustainable agricultural practices
subtasks: Organising training sessions on sustainable farming
Choosing topics based on farmer interest and need (like productivity, cost reduction)
Scheduling training sessions during suitable times
Hosting annual Agriculture and Environment Seminar
Organising technical workshops
Providing post-workshop farm support for implementing new practices
